tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
I am very satisfied with treatment I received at Dr. Gauri's  clinic.  Year back I had very bad infection in one tooth which impacted even bone. It took several sittings to fix that but Dr. Gauri made it easy for me and because of her efforts my tooth is been saved. Last week I again went to her with complaint of ache in my wisdom tooth. She investigated that it's was fractured and hence there was no way but to extract it. It was difficult one but she is very gentle and makes sure patient is comfortable. She prescribed right medicines for pain and even for mouth ulcers I had. I have experience with other dentists prior to Dr. Gauri but she is best in all. She seeks best for her patients and is very affordable. Her clinic is spacious, well equipped, very clean and with good staff.
I would highly recommend her for all dental services.
reply_text: Thank you Namita. You are kind

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Gauri Kadam and Dr Samia Mukaddam are experts  in their field.
I dint live in India. The dentist here had messed up the root canal.
It was in Dental Specialty Clinic it was redone from scratch under their expertise.

All my dental issues, may it be root canal, dental caps or mere routine check up or cleaning is done by either Dr Kadam or Dr Samia Mukaddam.

Their staff is friendly.
The clinic checks all levels of hygiene.

Not just adults even kids are comfortable with them.
I remember taking my 8 year old to Dr Gauri for a dental checkup and cavity treatment. He wasn‚Äôt scared or agitated during the procedure.

My Best Wishes for more years of great work and success.

review: Everything is perfect, cleanliness, doctors punctuality, explaining about the treatment before and after, the support, the concern, I am not telling because practo asked me to write something about the doctor and clinic but I will give 100 out of 100, it's the best clinic, doctors, warm welcome, friendly atmosphere., everything is so perfect and positive vibes, we don't feel we are in a clinic, everyone are so friendly and Dr Gauri Kadam and Dr Samia Khan seriously both are the best doctors in the world I feel... The doctor's smile I see my half tooth ache vanish, such pure soul... Trust me its the best clinic with the best team, I am blessed as I am tension free when it comes to my dental problems.. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My teeth are extremely sensitive ..
This makes drilling very painful for me....and hence difficult for the doctor...therefore the doctor works with anesthesia.....but my problem does not end there......the drilling releases cold water showers which makes it painful for the areas which are not under anesthesia....as my mouth is very sensitive to cold.....so what doesn't genius doc do ??? .....she covers all my teeth with a rubber sheet and leaves the damaged tooth exposed to work on......isn't that brilliant ??? She has a solution to every thing and makes sure u leave her clinic smiling..........üòÑ    Thankyou Gauri....
reply_text: Ohh that‚Äôs very kind of you Shamina. Thank you so much for writing back.
